1237210.name: EMPTY
1237210.description:
In the world of "EMPTY"
Earth is flat, and Depart from the very ground. You will be controlling "Master Humpback", Jump through each level and collect "RED CORE". While you walk through Each level, you will discover the Story of "EMPTY".

Gameplay :
Using "Z" to Jump. "X" to down dush. Left and Right key to move. All you have to do is to collect 25 "RED CORE", Sound easy? But it's actually EXTREMELY challenge. Here's the thing, You only have 60 second each level. Time's up, You Lose. Hit your character head, You Lose. So, Mastering the control, such as how to hover in the air, or remembering the map, are crucial to beat the game.

Update :
Every Level has it own special element. At the release there's 9 levels. and one special gamemode. There will be free update after release, NEW LEVEL! NEW ELEMENT! and even NEW MODE!
1237210.supported_languages:
英语*, 繁体中文*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
